author: zsfelfoldi
content: exiting and re-entering involves waiting months for my ETH to be unlocked and then waiting in the queue to re-enter... that is a very expensive way of changing my keys. I understand that it's not trivial to do (to change the key without stopping validation), just saying that it would be a good feature from a security perspective.
